title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. IV, subch. B, pt. 364 - Waste Transporter

Amended

New

York State Register September 20, 2017/Volume XXXIX, Issue 38, eff. 11/4/2017

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law
§§ 1-0101, 3-0301, titles 3, 5, 7 and 8 of article 17, titles 1, 3, 7, 9, 10, 13, and 15 of article 27, 27-1901, title 1 of article 70, titles 27, 35, and 40 of article 71, and §
72-0502. State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
